22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include <catch.hpp>
24 
25 using namespace Mutation;
26 using namespace Mutation::Kinetics;
27 using namespace Mutation::Utilities::IO;
28 using namespace Catch;
29 
33 void checkArrheniusRate(
34  double A, double n, double theta, int order, bool use_Ea = false)
35 {
36  std::stringstream xml;
37  xml << "<arrhenius A=\"" << A << "\" n = \"" << n << "\" ";
38  if (use_Ea)
39  xml << "Ea=\"" << theta * RU;
40  else
41  xml << "T=\"" << theta;
42  xml << "\" />";
43 
44  Arrhenius rate(XmlElement(xml.str()), 1);
45 
46  CHECK(rate.A() == Approx(A));
47  CHECK(rate.n() == Approx(n));
48  CHECK(rate.T() == Approx(theta));
49 
50  for (int i = 0; i < 10; ++i) {
51  double T = i * 1000.0 + 1000.0;
52  double k = A * std::pow(T, n) * std::exp(-theta / T);
53 
54  CHECK( rate.getLnRate(std::log(T), 1.0/T) == Approx(std::log(k)) );
55 
56  CHECK(
57  rate.derivative(k, std::log(T), 1.0/T) ==
58  Approx(k * (n + theta / T) / T)
59  );
60  }
61 }
62 
66 TEST_CASE("Arrhenius rate laws work correctly", "[kinetics]")
67 {
68  // Check that the rate is calculated correctly
69  for (int order = 1; order < 4; ++order) {
70  checkArrheniusRate(5.0e15, 0.0, order, 75500.0);
71  checkArrheniusRate(5.0e15, 0.0, order, 75500.0, true);
72  checkArrheniusRate(5.0e15, 1.0, order, 75500.0);
73  checkArrheniusRate(5.0e15, 1.0, order, 75500.0, true);
74  checkArrheniusRate(5.0e15, -1.0, order, 75500.0);
75  checkArrheniusRate(5.0e15, -1.0, order, 75500.0, true);
76  }
77 
78  // Check that loading fails properly
79  CHECK_THROWS( Arrhenius(XmlElement("<arrhenius />"), 1) );
80  CHECK_THROWS( Arrhenius(XmlElement("<arrhenius A=\"1\"/>"), 1) );
81  CHECK_THROWS( Arrhenius(XmlElement("<arrhenius A=\"1\" n=\"1\"/>"), 1) );
82  CHECK_THROWS( Arrhenius(XmlElement("<arrhenius T=\"1\" n=\"1\"/>"), 1) );
83  CHECK_THROWS( Arrhenius(XmlElement("<arrhenius Ea=\"1\" n=\"1\"/>"), 1) );
84  CHECK_NOTHROW( Arrhenius(XmlElement("<arrhenius A=\"1\" T=\"1\"/>"), 1) );
85  CHECK_NOTHROW( Arrhenius(XmlElement("<arrhenius A=\"1\" Ea=\"1\"/>"), 1) );
86 }
